resource_explanation:
El Plano events API.

Event attributes :

 - `title` - Represents event name.
 - `description` - Represents event detailed description.
 - `status` - Represents event current status.
   - `confirmed` - The event is confirmed. This is the default status.
   - `tentative` - The event is tentatively confirmed.
   - `cancelled` - The event is cancelled (deleted).

 - `recurrence` - Represents recurrence rules.
 - `timezone` - Timezone settings.
 - `start_at` - Represents when event starts.
 - `end_at` - Represents when event ends.
 - timestamps

 Also, includes reference to the event creator.

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Praesentium maiores consequatur.","description":"Qui aut quia. Recusandae officiis dolorem. Quos provident porro. Temporibus sint sunt. Aut excepturi totam.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-21","end_at":"2019-02-23","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/events" -d '{"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Praesentium maiores consequatur.","description":"Qui aut quia. Recusandae officiis dolorem. Quos provident porro. Temporibus sint sunt. Aut excepturi totam.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-21","end_at":"2019-02-23","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer d5d2d3266e5e5967add04d5c0eef10953fa55872bbdf9aa173ad24a0afd577e3" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
